mql_tools.configuration.Include4Dir.desc: Path to the "Include" folder: MQL4 (not necessarily)
mql_tools.configuration.Include5Dir.desc: Path to the "Include" folder: MQL5 (not necessarily)
mql_tools.configuration.LogDir.descripti: The name of the log file. If not completed, it will be created automatically
mql_tools.configuration.Timetomini.descr: Time from start to minimize MetaEditor in milliseconds. (Script)
mql_tools.configuration.CloseME.descript:
Close MetaEditor after compilation. (Script) 
If this parameter is turned on, then the compilation time using the script is increased by 2 times.
